We are a nation that leads with strengthâ€”a nation that knows â€˜the only thing we have to fear is fear itselfâ€™â€”not a nation that cowers in fear when faced with difficult choices. The America that I know is not one that slams its doors on families and children fleeing barbarism and terror, but one that shines brightly as a beacon of hope for all human beings. Giving in to our fears, as the President has done, is not the action of a strong country.
